data.message: Off Topic . . . But please STOP changing my news feed from my choice of "Most Recent" to your preference "Top Stories"! I don't care what you think are top stories . . . I prefer to see the most recent!! Over time I change it Facebook changes it back!

replies.message: Hey Jeffrey. We've invested a lot to understand how News Feed can show the most engaging content to the majority of people. Top Stories is the result of our findings, which is why it is the default. We know that some people prefer the Most Recent view, so we've kept this option available. If you have specific thoughts you want to share, please let us know here: http://on.fb.me/1rmVirO. -Hailey
I can appreciate default settings, but normally when I change a default setting to my personal preference it stays that way. This keeps changing to your default setting!
haha FB has no idea what we prefer.  Even their surveys make you answer to their benefit.  lol  FB is funny.
Facebook changes stuff all the time. I've never been once asked about some "survey" they mention. I wonder who the audience is that says the things we prefer

I just found out about 30 min. ago from a friend that when I edit a post other people can click on "Edit" and see what I edited. I don't think I like that. What if I had posted something about them or said something that I decided I didn't want them to see and changed it. They could still click edit and see it.
